meanings.definition: Fertilizers consisting of animal or vegetable matter
meanings.sent1: Farmers use manures to help their crops grow.
meanings.sent2: The garden needed more manures to thrive.
meanings.sent3: The manures made the soil very happy.
meanings.sent4: The fields were hungry for the manures' nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The smell of manures filled the air, signaling growth.
